meanings.definition: A person who writes computer programs.
meanings.sent1: Many programmers work long hours to create software.
meanings.sent2: The company hired talented programmers to develop their new app.
meanings.sent3: Why did the programmers bring a ladder to the coding competition? To reach the higher code!
meanings.sent4: In the digital world, programmers are the architects who build the virtual cities.
meanings.sent5: The programmers' fingers danced across the keyboard, bringing life to lines of code.

meanings.definition: A group of people who write computer programs.
meanings.sent1: The programmers collaborated to solve the complex coding problem.
meanings.sent2: At the hackathon, various programmers showcased their innovative projects.
meanings.sent3: The programmers' team name was 'Byte Me' - a clever play on words.
meanings.sent4: In the tech industry, programmers are the wizards weaving spells with code.
meanings.sent5: The room buzzed with creativity as the programmers brainstormed ideas for the software.
